item.title: Humble Freebie: LEGO Lord of the Rings
item.description: Hello, Christmas and giving season is still here. We have a new FREE game from Humble Bundle! Get LEGO Lord of the Rings free for a limited time at https://www.humblebundle.com/store/lego-the-lord-of-the-rings   LIMITED TIME OFFER ENDS DECEMBER 22 AT 10 A.M. PACIFIC TIME Thank you Humble Bundle for another addition to our game library. Game can be redeemed on Steam.   To get more updates on freebies and cool stuff like these, please subscribe to our newsletter.
